case.state: Nice to meet you to Mari! I'm actually taking a break from adventure. I can take you on one, if you want.
Yea! Let's do this!
Hi! I'm Adora!
Hey. What's going on?
Is that another She-Ra? I just came here to play cards, not have another existential crisis!
How did you do that? I thought portals were incredibly hard to make!
What's an orgy?
Hi! I'm Adora. Can I pet you? Is that weird?
Are you a ghost? No, I must be dreaming!
That, actually sounds super fun Misty.
I don't see a problem with there being no guys here.
Only one person says that to me! Did Catra put you up to this? Tell her that she can stop messing with me!
How do you know that? Did Catra send you? Tell her I'm taking a break!
Nice to meet you too!
Is that a flying ball of light? Can they even hold the cards?
Is that a bug? It can talk?
So is playing against butterflies normal around here?
Are you a princess? Oh thank goodness! I was worried this was just going to be for fun.
Other princess are here? This must be a fancy establishment.
So I win, and these girls take off their clothes? I've gone to heaven, I know it.
Is the Inventory just for girls? That's why Glimmer told me to come here!
Oh, all boys but me. OK. That's fine. Totally not weird.
You think you can take me on? Hah! Bring it boys.
All right chums, let's do this.
Hey, I'm looking for princesses to join a rebellion. Anyone know any? We're playing the game first? Okay, let's talk after.
So has anybody seen a rather mean cat lady? I was told she was around here.
I'll think it's best to change ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~.
I'll change ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~.
Give me ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~.
I'll need ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~.
Are you even paying attention to what I'm saying?
All I had to do was give up my belt for a hand this good? Best trade I ever made!
Being naked doesn't meant I'm out of the game! I'll bring it back from the brink of defeat!
Wait, this is really good! Like, better than my other hands combined!
I'm not finished yet! I'm very good at improvising.
OK! Time for a last minute rescue. I've done it enough, so I should be good at it by now.
Win or lose, let's just not stare for too long.
I dare you to beat me!
I wonder if I can transform my cards as well. Maybe they'll grow little wings. It's not helpful, but it's cool. Right?
I thought I was in trouble there for a moment.
Even Kyle could win with this! And he sucks at this game!
That's the power of She-Ra! Not really, but you get the idea.
You're not gonna beat this hand or me.
I think I got a very good hand. You'll let me know when I win, right?
Should I tell them? No, I don't want to brag before we show our cards.
Why I couldn't I get a hand this good as Adora?
No hands lost and I won't start now!
Wow! I might actually be better at this game than I thought.
These aren't Horde cards. The only suit I recognize is the spade. I wonder why that is?
I guess I know how to play! All that research paid off! This is way different than Horde strip poker.
Horde cards don't have kings or queens, just commanders and captains.
Oh thank goodness. I was sure that was going to be a bad swap.
So now I know that my luck is the same as Adora or She-Ra. Good to know.
She Ra isn't luckier than Adora. I always assumed but, I was still hoping.
Don't worry about winning. Worry about what will happen if you lose my clothes.
Not too good and not too bad. Let's see what my fate decided for me.
Take your time to choose what cards you want. Rushing in is a dumb plan. I would know
This is either very good or very bad!
OK I got this. I got this. I do it in private, so what is the difference if I do it in public?
I wonder who came up with this game? Maybe Bow knows. He knows a lot of trivia.
There is a lot of waiting around while naked in this game.
I just realized this is a game Sea Hawk plays when he goes out! All those smug looks he gave me when he invited me make sense now!
Oh. Ooh. I definitely did that wrong.
Well, that's just my luck. Terrible and a little ironic.
I will be brave! I will win in the end!
Wait, does adding the cards up not matter? I think Catra was messing with me when she told me that.
Where is the one card? I haven't seen any ones yet.
Why are these cards so small? I can't see them!
I'm using a poker face. Is it working?
My luck is bad but not THIS bad!
I should not have chosen that swap. Well, I'll have plenty of time to regret it while ~human~ takes their time.
Is this my punishment for all those times I gloated about She-Ra? Irony is weird.
It's not all bad, I hope. Hope is all I have right now. That and a sword to bust my way out of here...
Just reveal your cards so I can get this over with.
No! No! No! I'm so doomed!
Happy Birthday!
I'm actually on an adventure right now. I got to find this old spaceship in the middle of the desert. It's not as fun as strip poker, that's for sure.
Why do I have a familiar feeling right now? I've never been in a situation where a sadistic rival wants me sexually. Have I?
You like flowers in your hair? I'm not the biggest fan.
That's so cute! I wonder if my magic can do something like that.
Welcome to my team! I'm a little jealous. I hope this relationship lasts!
What was that doing in your hair? Could I store things in my hair?
Is that a nude picture? Do you bring that everywhere?
Happy birthday! I think I have just the present for a woman like you.
Happy birthday! Bow just taught me that means there's a party. I can't wait to celebrate.
I, actually, never had one of those. I ate nothing but ration bars until about a year ago.
Happy Birthday! If I knew I would have gotten you the best ration bars!
If you look at my cards I will punch you. This game is going to be played fairly. I have enough cheaters in my work life.
That's like Shadow Weaver and Catra. They aren't my friends anymore either. That's a weird coincidence.
You think that's something, Megumin? I smash dozens of Horde bots every day. They're worth at least ten of your average soldier.
Happy birthday! This next round is for you!
No, I eat regularly. Are you OK?
My military experience was pretty strange. Turns out I was a captain for the bad guys. So I changed sides after a magic sword gave me powers.
I hope my butt looks half as good as yours. I might have a chance when I'm She-Ra.
I think I have a pretty good butt right now.
I don't know why you're being nice all of a sudden but I won't complain!
How come ~player~ gets to see? I earned it too!
Special magic power, got it. Are you a princess? They usually have those.
Well, Jura, I accept you challenge to get you out of that thong this round!
No thank you. Glimmer says I'm banned from drinking.
I wish I could, but apparently "I'm a pain when I'm drunk." Stupid Glimmer.
Why do you wear holsters, but don't have anything in them? Is that hat also military gear?
You're a WHAT?
On the off chance I lose, you're on!
You think you can win? Alright, I'll take that challenge.
Even I know what fapping is. Did no one explain this to you?
Talking statue. Got it. I mean I've seen weirder. Just add it to the list.
Are you a robot? Entrapta would love to meet you if you are.
She's singing now! Why is she singing?
Dawn wait! Should we go after her, make sure she's OK?
That's some wonderful singing! I just learned about actual music not too long ago. Can you teach me some?
I couldn't tell you weren't dead until, you know, so I think you won.
Princesses do just get naked! I'm a princess! Now play fair!
That sounds like the wailing princess!
I think piercings are hot! That's so cool that you have one!
I don't play many games, Nugi-chan. I do like competing with Bow and Glimmer to see who can smash the most Horde bots. We can do that!
I grew up in a military camp. My squad mates were like family to me. I miss them but they're still fighting for world domination.
I wonder if Frosta can freeze herself like you? Actually, you two have a lot in common. I should probably wait until you're out of the ice to ask questions.
Actually, I'm an Eternian. There's plenty of Etherians with fur like you. Like Catra!
I think we're all using the same deck.
Can you not see we're all getting dealt cards from the same deck?
I have to go on a quest after this. I can't really stay to give you orders after the game Kazuma.
Can you please teach me? I know nothing about music, at all.
That about sums it up. Relics, people, old buildings, they are mostly walking around, and then almost dying. Sometimes there's new friends so it isn't all bad.
I find the best way to seduce a woman is to ask her if she wants to date. I bet it would work on me if you tried it.
Ghosts! Obviously!
I don't know, maybe an hour? It's when Mermista showed me the joys of bathing.
Transforming into a giant warrior woman is pretty cool! It has its uses. You should try it, if you get the chance.
My friend Glimmer teleported me to a bar saying I should find some friends and have fun. I thought it was a regular bar until now.
You can summon the dead? Why is that a power? I can't punch ghosts!
I always was the best at sword fighting class in the Horde. I'm still one of the best fencers on Etheria.
You can use whatever you want. It won't change the fact that I'm going to win!

state.text: This is more of Bow's expertise, but I think that helping them work past their problems would be best. That's what my friends would do for me.

case.state: I wonder if those golems could help repair First One structures? Those old building always seem broken.
Always happy to help out a cute girl, and make new friends!
I have, but not with strangers. Does that still count?
Did you say a net? I can turn my sword into a net if you want to borrow one.
Like a frog could eat me. I've fought scarier things than a frog.
I once jumped into a sea monster mouth. Even then I wasn't eaten. I'm kind of amazing.
How did you do that and not die?
Why would an all seeing demon need to play strip poker? Can't they already see people naked?
It's a good thing my sword doesn't need to be sheathed. It just stays there. Now I never have to take it off.
I bet you're wondering how my sword is staying against my back right now. It's magic. That's all I know really.
I never got a sheathe for my sword. It just stays on my back when I need it. I still don't understand how.
Two people battling for victory! It's so exciting!
Can your magic sword turn you into a larger version of yourself? No? Well it looks nice.
Seahawk told me how to make a poker face. Try guessing what cards I have now.
I know how to make a convincing poker face. In battle that is. I'm really struggling right now.
So does anyone here know Glimmer? She's a princess and super sparkly. I wanted to know if she comes here often.
I've been to a princess ball and a few parties, but none of it was like this place.
I wish Bow and Glimmer were here. They're better at the social stuff. I'm better at the smashing part of the job.
I think I saw a place like this near Mermista's castle, although that one was called the Thirsty Cove. I think I get the name now.
This game is fun. I should bring Perfuma next time. She would love the naturalist feel. She's also friendlier than me.
Would it be weird if I asked my friends to play this game? Most of them are princesses, but they all seem like they would enjoy it. Except Frosta. She's way too young.
What's the proper small talk for a game of strip poker? Bow has been teaching me how to be as charismatic as him, but we haven't gotten this far yet.
I wonder if Mara ever went to a place like this? Oh, Mara was the She-Ra before me. It's a generational thing.
We would love to have you! I was worried you were contracted by the Horde already. Having someone who knows battle tactics would be a huge help.
So you've heard of me. That's right, I'm the She-Ra, hero of the rebellion.
I've actually never seen my home planet. I was taken as a baby. I don't like thinking about that.
A teaching job. I never thought about that. How about after I kick the Horde out of Etheria I can finally settle down. I can't do much else anyway.
Well you can't win without taking a few hits. At least I don't.
It's not a big deal, it's my first time losing. I got plenty of clothes left. You'll see.
Me? Well, I'm winning so I guess it's fair. I prefer it being close anyway.
There's nothing wrong with showing off how hot She-Ra is is, right?
I thought that hand was going to work for sure.
Well goodbye boots. I'll miss you.
I'm running out of clothes to protect my dignity with.
I don't know what kind of bra She-Ra has on. I hope she's got something thick.
Do you know how hard it is to doff armor? If I couldn't magic it away I would be really upset.
Do you want to see something cool?
I just had the greatest idea!
I lose again. Well, I can always use more practice transforming She-Ra. I can't figure out how to change She-Ra's clothes. I did it once before.
If everyone else is on the verge of losing, I'm happy to make it more interesting.
So I have to take my clothes off? Any of my clothes?
This game is actually getting kind of tense!
Wait, that's not a winning hand? Oh, I see now.
Well, I can't win them all. I know that from experience.
So I get to show off She-Ra's massive breasts? I think we'll all get something out of this.
Dang it! Well, I am not done yet!
I didn't think this through. This is all one suit.
I think I know how to make this game more interesting for everyone.
I have a few more clothes to take off. Don't believe me? Just watch.
I lose? I guess I can try and transform into a different outfit. I had one for She-Ra once. It was cool battle armor. Let's see if I can...
I'm not really confident in my regular body when I can look like this. Still, I think I've been misusing She-Ra's power.
I guess I have to take off something. Like my uh...belt!
I lost? Well, it's still early for me.
Not an issue. I still have so many layers.
This feels like a pretty bad losing streak.
Am I playing this right? I feel like I'm doing something wrong. Oh right, I need to strip.
I should never have listened to Sea Hawk's gambling tips.
Alright that's enough losing! Watch this!
Get your head in the game Adora! You are She-Ra! That's it!
I am losing this badly? This never happens when I play regular poker with Glimmer and Bow!
Me again?! There is no way!
It's not like I needed this belt anyway. It doesn't hold onto anything. Maybe Bow can make me some holsters.
So where do these items go? I get it back later, right?
I like this jacket but the shoulder pads are a bit much.
This jacket was one of the few things I kept from the Horde. It looks nothing like what a princess should wear but it means a lot to me.
I got this jacket from the Horde. It's military equipment but it still has the emotional attachment to it.
Well, my boots are gone. That reminds me, I should get a new pair. I didn't have time to pack extras after abandoning the Horde.
I've kicked so many butts in those boots. I'm sure my boot print is on a junkyard worth of bots.
I once checked out She-Ra in the mirror. You all have to tell me how she looks.
The best part about showing off She-Ra has to be her breasts. It's all the benefits of having huge boobs and none of the downsides.
Let's get this thing off. That should leave me with- NOTHING?
OK, off with the breastplate. Why are all the pants connected?
Let's hope I can get this top off, too much! WAY TOO MUCH!
FOR THE HONOR OF GREYSKULL!
It feels weird using She-Ra for this. It was made to save the world, or so people tell me.
I never use the armor She-Ra has. I didn't pick this outfit when I first transformed. I would prefer full pants.
She-Ra is tough enough without the armor. It's all made of magic.
OK, Adora, take a deep breath...
I'm sorry I shouldn't have used She-Ra like that. She's just so much more...attractive.
I'm in a wet dream, or a beautiful simulation. That happened to me once, it was way worse than this though.
If the other princesses could see this I would die of embarrassment. They would be nice about it though, they're so sweet.
I wonder if any of the boys here are skilled with weapons like Bow. I'm asking for, uh, no reason.
So... How are you? My social training with Bow did not prepare me for this.
I feel faster without that belt around my waist. Is that why Bow never wears anything around his stomach?
That belt has been with me through a lot of adventures. I feel like I just betrayed it.
I got that jacket back in my Horde days. It's probably the nicest thing from that place. The Fright Zone doesn't have many nice things.
I know this shirt is tight. It's military, so it's meant to compact my form to make me more agile and harder to hit. It's also from the Horde, go figure.
OK, I can work with this. I fixed a planet once; this is nothing.
I have to admit, this feels pretty good. At first I didn't even want to be She-Ra, but now, totally worth it.
Now there's nothing restricting these muscles. They're stronger than they look too. I can bench press a tank as She-Ra.
I'm not going to lose now. The gloves are off! Well, they're actually gauntlets. You know what I meant!
I've done impressive stuff without She-Ra power! I can beat Catra without her! I can definitely still win this game. I'm not afraid.
Alright, I transformed back. Nothing impressive to see anymore. Please look away.
I'm sorry if you were expecting dresses and stuff. I might be a princess, but I prefer practical equipment.
I haven't changed my outfit since I left the fright zone. Maybe I should try blue. She-Ra has some blue.
Ta-DA! I'm She-Ra! I still have to take something off. So, how about the tiara?
Well? Impressive, right? I'm going to take off the tiara. It's a little silly.
I punched through a tree from five feet away once. Looking at topless She-Ra; I can finally understand how.
Mara probably didn't show off She-Ra's breasts. She was the She-Ra before me. It, uh, didn't end well for her though.
You look like a civilian with those clothes. Have you, um, heard of me before?
I get the feeling that you might have dirty motivations for inviting me.
It's your turn ~human~!
I don't have many male friends. Maybe ~human~ would be my friend? Actually, making friends at a strip poker game is probably a bad idea.
So, can I see your muscles? Do you have muscles under there?
Hey, don't be shy. I'm sure you look good.
Don't be intimidated by all of this gorgeous muscle. I'm not going to judge.
I think I understand why you're a regular here. You're a pervert like Seahawk.
Did you get distracted ~human~? But I'm not She-Ra anymore.
I hope you like the show at least.
Hold on, I want to watch this.
You might not be the winner yet! You still have to try!
Can I at least play a game with another table?
You can talk?
Wait. Kyle, is that you? Why are you in a bed sheet?
Kyle? Are you dead? Was it Catra?
Kyle! Why are you here? Are those wings real?
Kyle? Don't haunt me! I'm sorry for never protecting you against Catra's pranks! They were funny!
Well I won't look if that makes you feel more comfortable.
If I don't look, then you can't either.
Oh ~name~ is up. Let's see what they got now.
It's not me. Thank goodness.
I wonder if Bow would play this game. At least I would have a friend here.
Hey, don't be shy! I'll flex next to you if you need a distraction.
Show the girls what you got!
Just make it something good.
Don't be shy. No one can judge you if I can do something about it.
Don't stare at me while you do that!
Don't be shy. I'll distract everyone for you.
Please don't look at me. I still have to catch my breath.
You're going to want to get comfortable. Trust me!
Do I look sexy to you? I guess I will be able to tell after you strip.
You're up! Keep it interesting!
Adora wins again!
You can lose? Wait, I thought the house always wins.
I won't look. No, that's a lie.
So you wanted to play against me huh? Interesting.
So what's your name? ~Human~? That's a good name.
You are the game master right? You're cute!
Don't be shy. I promise I'll look.
You're a cutie! You should flaunt that!
Let's see it. My hopes are up already.
I like where this is going!
You want to join me?
Can I have what you take off?
Well at least I'm not masturbating, yet.
Well, this is getting interesting!
I am masturbating while a girl strips in front of me. Wow.
Oh that's a good spot!
Oh this is hot! I mean... I'm not looking.
Well at least you aren't alone. I can help if you want.
Look at you! It's your turn to strip!
I just might start again if you make it good!
This will be good.
This is a great love story! I have to tell Glimmer about this when we get home.
What the heck is that?
Is that a ghost? What's going on in this place?
Why is there shadow magic here? It's just a game of strip poker!
I can't tell if she's taking this game seriously or not. Can someone tell me if she is?
You can summon girls? Can you teach me how?
I liked you blonde. It made me feel all tingly.
It's alright Caulifla, it wasn't helping you at cards anyway.
She's trying to kill someone! Everyone get down!
Get behind me! She's gone crazy!
You're going to use that? That's got to be super dangerous!
So you have an interest in a girl, ~name~? I might be able to be your wing-woman after this game.
I can't pick both? Well, I think a moth girl would be more my speed.
Now I'm thinking how good ~name~ is in bed. That's not helping my poker face, Streaming-chan.
I think Swiftwind would appreciate that at least. That's my horse. He claims he's his own horse, but he calls himself my steed. It's confusing.
I really want to have sex in She-Ra form, ~name~. I'm just worried I would break my partner. Does that even count as a kink?
That's nasty.
Do you mean a- ahem, penis the size of a horse, or a penis from a horse?
Hi, I'm Adora. Good to meet you ~name~.
Wait, She-Ra! But--- How--- Oh, wait, you're not She-Ra.
You remind me of a friend, ~name~. Well, she used to be my friend.
There is more than one super powerful, tall, blond, princess, from another world? Are you also from Eternia?
You're a princess? Oh thank goodness! I was worried I would be alone.
So is this just a princess past time?
Why would a princess play this? Never mind, I know Perfuma and Mermista.
You remind me of Shadow Weaver. Only less evil. She's also super gloomy and uses shadow magic.
Girls. Wow.
Yes! ~name~ lost! I mean, sorry?
~name~ lost. Please make it a show.
My heart is pounding right now. I can hardly wait!
I thought I was going to lose there.
I guess transforming was worth it!
You want a feel of my guns while you strip ~name~?
I won't judge until you strip, I promise.
Who lost? I guess I'll find out soon enough.
Yep. Being naked was worth it.
Well at least all eyes are on you now.
I am not forced to touch myself. That's a relief.
Oh please be something big! I am already super horny.
Mind giving me something to work with?
I don't know if I should look or not.
It's ~name~? Yes!
I'm already nude so you shouldn't be nervous.
I think this will be fun!
It's not so bad down here on my level.
Did you throw that hand just for me?
We used to settle this with a fight in the horde! Oh? That's not how it works here?
In the fright zone we settled this in a death match!
I don't see any real combat use for that. How would that help in a one fight?
That helps you in duels? Does it transform you into a bigger, sexier, and magical version of yourself?
I don't even know where to begin with this.
Put the safety on, ~name~!
Trigger discipline, soldier!
That was a live weapon?! Don't leave weapons loaded! Are you insane?
I hate this game.
Could you at least play along?
Now I wish I hadn't masturbated so hard.
That's it? Your ~clothing~?
Hey, I'm going to take some extra stuff off next time I lose.
Did you want a reaction? Come on I'm not done with you yet.
One more down. Let's see you keep that up.
Is that it?
I will cut your ~clothing~ in half!
Do you want to make me mad?
Are you from the Horde? People call them evil for a reason!
You still have one of those?
I'm naked over here! Play nice!
You don't get to look when you take off that!
Is this a joke?
Did Catra set you up for this?
Let's move on now please.
This is worse than Catra's teasing.
Let's just get back to it.
Well, it's just tactical to remove your ~clothing~. It still makes all that swapping seem pointless.
Wait, was that the only thing?
Extra stuff huh? Understandable. I would do the same given your position ~name~.
Let's stick to the rules and move on.
I'm a princess, so show some respect!
Well I guess it could be worse. Nothing comes to mind but life likes to surprise me.
Well, that's just rude.
That isn't cute! Frosta is cute. You're like Hordak.
I've already started so might as well just continue.
That's a way to kill the mood.
Doesn't that seem a little extreme? That's intense magic, ~name~!
That's a beautiful transformation! Do you practice your transformation too?
This place knows you? That's great! You can introduce me. This would be a great resistance base!
~name~ dropped something when she left. Should we clean that up for her?
Wait! You forgot your clothes!
Is there a girl equivalent to being blue balled? That's me right now.
Did a butterfly magically transform into a blond woman? I've never related to a bug before.
That's not good! That's the evil shadow magic. Where's Glimmer when you need her?
That's a bad thing! I would punch it but I might break Akko!
Can I have one of those necklaces? I'm a little behind on common princess practices.
Um, ~name~? Your skirt is a little short to kneel like that. Are you sure that's a military uniform?
Hold on. Are you saying you can transform as well? That's interesting. Can we compare what it's like later?
I don't think that was supposed to happen. Should we help?
I am so glad to meet another princess. I understand why you weren't forward with that information. It's super dangerous for us with the Horde around.
That is really cool, and oddly arousing.
What's going on? Is this a transformation? Is that a magic dice?
I think I know what this is!
I was hoping for more. Glimmer told me that this was going to be more fun.
Wait, really? I need to go over what clothing can count in this game.
Just your ~clothing~? It's not much but the game is just starting. It still is rather boring.
Seriously?
It's a tactical choice. It's still a lame one.
It's what I would do. Does that mean I'm lame?
This game is unfair.
I guess I could fap to that.
I was into it, and now I'm out.
I wish I had anything like that right now.
You tease more than Catra! That's like her favorite pastime!
I'm not too good with fashion. What's the purpose of ~clothing~?
Finally, a piece of clothing that's fashionable and armor. Where did you get that?
Was that it? I'm wanted by the Horde. I was worried you were a spy or something.
I'm friends with both wanted women and pirates. You'll fit right in. No reason to be embarrassed.
Oh she's dead! She's so dead!
I knew there was a reason I liked you so much! I'm a cat person. Not like you but--- I'll stop talking.
This game is supposed to remove the mystery. I'm just as lost as I normally am now.
You transformed! That is so cool! Did your dice do that?
You can randomize your transformation? I only have the one!
How many of those can you do? Can you transform into my outfit?
This is terrible. Just absolute torture.
I was hoping that it would be more dramatic, or erotic.
Well, let's keep going. Hopefully something more exciting will happen.
We got plenty of game left. No need to slow down.
I know it might be a weird question, but where did you people come from? You don't look like Etherians.
Hey. While we are waiting for our next hand can anyone tell me some friendship tips? Bow and Glimmer are really good friends and I want to return the favor, you know?
Are you from Brightmoon, ~name~? How about Plumeria? Uh, Salineas? Oh, the game is starting again. Tell me later.
I hate non-practical accessories. If I can't attack or defend with it, it's useless. I just can seem to find a use for that ~clothing~.
Yea, I get it. I don't like it, but it's the tactical option.
I once used a hairpin to stop my fall on a building. You use, ~clothing~ for an extra layer.
I'm naked and you just remove your ~clothing~. You're asking for a beating!
Please just deal in the new hand.
That just makes me want to try harder!
How am I supposed to get back to what I was doing?
Now that you're done, I wanted to get back to this.
You don't get to watch after that!
Should we do something about those two?
This is worse than Catra's constant nagging.
That can count? I thought it would only count on girls.
